data.eml:eml: A new species of Tenuipalpus sensu stricto (Acari: Tenuipalpidae) from Brazil, with ontogeny and a key to the known species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Castro, Elizeu B., Feres, Reinaldo J. F., Ochoa, Ronald, Bauchan, Gary R. (2016): A new species of Tenuipalpus sensu stricto (Acari: Tenuipalpidae) from Brazil, with ontogeny and a key to the known species. Zootaxa 4088 (3): 355-378, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4088.3.3
